div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ImmunizationEvaluation|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 Resource `ImmunizationEvaluation` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `ImmunizationEvaluation`. Element `ImmunizationEvaluation` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ImmunizationEvaluation`.
Element `ImmunizationEvaluation.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ImmunizationEvaluation.meta`.
Element `ImmunizationEvaluation.implicitRules` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ImmunizationEvaluation.implicitRules`.
Element `ImmunizationEvaluation.language` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ImmunizationEvaluation.language`.
Element `ImmunizationEvaluation.text` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ImmunizationEvaluation.text`.
Element `ImmunizationEvaluation.contained` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ImmunizationEvaluation.contained`.
Element `ImmunizationEvaluation.identifier` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ImmunizationEvaluation.identifier`.
Element `ImmunizationEvaluation.status` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ImmunizationEvaluation.status`.
Element `ImmunizationEvaluation.patient` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ImmunizationEvaluation.patient`.
Element `ImmunizationEvaluation.date` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ImmunizationEvaluation.date`.
Element `ImmunizationEvaluation.authority` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ImmunizationEvaluation.authority`.
Element `ImmunizationEvaluation.targetDisease` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ImmunizationEvaluation.targetDisease`.
Element `ImmunizationEvaluation.immunizationEvent` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ImmunizationEvaluation.immunizationEvent`.
Element `ImmunizationEvaluation.doseStatus` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ImmunizationEvaluation.doseStatus`.
Element `ImmunizationEvaluation.doseStatusReason` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ImmunizationEvaluation.doseStatusReason`.
Element `ImmunizationEvaluation.description` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ImmunizationEvaluation.description`.
Element `ImmunizationEvaluation.series` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ImmunizationEvaluation.series`.

Note that the target element context `ImmunizationEvaluation.doseNumber[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `ImmunizationEvaluation`. Element `ImmunizationEvaluation.doseNumber` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ImmunizationEvaluation.doseNumber[x]`. Note that the target element context `ImmunizationEvaluation.doseNumber[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `ImmunizationEvaluation`.

Note that the target element context `ImmunizationEvaluation.seriesDoses[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `ImmunizationEvaluation`. Element `ImmunizationEvaluation.seriesDoses` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ImmunizationEvaluation.seriesDoses[x]`. Note that the target element context `ImmunizationEvaluation.seriesDoses[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `ImmunizationEvaluation`.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.
